I061/000.item definition: This data item allows for a more convenient handling of the message at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

data.name2: Message nature within the family − Connection Messages (family 1) :
options: Request for Disconnection (SDPS to user, user to SDPS) ,
Disconnection Acknowledgement (SDPS to user, user to
Disconnection Rejection (SDPS to user) . − Service Messages (family 2) :
Service Suspension Request (SDPS to user, user to
Service Resumption Request (SDPS to user, user to
Service Termination Request (SDPS to user, user to
Service Acknowledgement (SDPS to user, user to SDPS) ,

End of Batch (SDPS to user) . Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages Table 2 – List of Items per Family / Nature M = mandatory; O = optional. Reference Number Description 1 2 3 4 5 6 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 15 Request for Connection Request for Disconnection Connection Acknowledgeme Connection Rejection Disconnection Acknowledgeme Disconnection Rejection Service Definition Service Modification Service Suspension Service Resumption Service Termination Service Acknowledgeme Service Rejection Service Report End of Batch I061/000 MESSAGE TYPE M M M M M M M M M M M M M M M I061/010 SDPS IDENTIFICATION M M M M M M M M M M M M M M M I061/012 USER IDENTIFICATION M M M M M M M M M M M M M M M I061/015 SERVICE IDENTIFICATION O 1 M M M M M O 1 M M I061/020 TIME OF MESSAGE M M M M M M M M M M M M M M M I061/045 APPLICATION VERSION NUMBER M I061/050 DEFAULT GEOGRAPHICAL VOLUME O O I061/060 GEOGRAPHICAL AREA O O I061/070 LOWER LIMIT O O I061/080 UPPER LIMIT O O I061/090 PREFERRED FPPS IDENTIFICATION TAG O O I061/100 CONNECTION RELATED REPORT O O O O I061/110 SERVICE IDENTIFICATION O O I061/130 TRACK SELECTOR O O I061/210 ITEM SELECTOR O O I061/220 CYCLICAL UPDATE CHARACTERISTICS O O I061/230 RADAR SYNCHRONISATION CHARACTERISTICS O O I061/240 TRIGGERING CRITERIA FOR APERIODICAL SERVICES O O I061/330 SERVICE RELATED REPORT O O O O O O M I061/350 SENSOR SELECTOR O O I061/360 SENSOR ITEM SELECTOR O O I061/370 PERIODICAL CHARACTERISTICS OF SENSOR INFORMATION O O I061/380 APERIODICAL CHARACTERISTICS OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE O O 1 see encoding rule for I061/015 Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages

I061/010.item definition: Identification of the SDPS providing track/sensor information

subfields.note: The up-to-date list of SACs is published on the Eurocontrol Web Site (http://www.eurocontrol.int) .

I061/012.item definition: Identification of the user requesting track/sensor information

I061/015.item definition: Identification of the service provided to one or more users.

I061/020.item definition: Absolute time stamping of the message, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

subfields.note: The time of the day value is reset to zero at every midnight.

I061/030.item definition: A number indicating the completion of a service for that batch of track data, from 0 to N-1, N being the number of batches used to make one complete processing cycle.

I061/045.item definition: Version number of the SDPS application .

I061/050.item definition: Identifies the default geographical volume of interest of the user

subfields.note: This item is exclusive with I061/060 , and with I061/070, and with I061/080. Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages

I061/060.item definition: Geographical area of interest of the user

subfields.note: S 1. Closure of the polygon is not required Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages 2. None of the border segments that make up the geographical area should cross or overlap 3. This item is exclusive with I061/0505 .2.10 Data Item I061/070, Lower Limit Definition : Lower limit of the geographical volume of interest Format : Two-octet fixed length Data Item
subfields.subfield info: REP Latitude in WGS - 84 LSB Longitude in WGS - 84 LSB

I061/080.item definition: Upper limit of the geographical volume of interest

I061/100.item definition: Report message sent by the SDPS to the User in relation to a connection.

data.name2: Repetition Factor : 1 to 255 (The Repetition Factor will be > 1 when e.g. several errors have been detected within a connection Request) .

I061/130.item definition: Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

data.name2: Repetition Factor Bits 48/1 characters 1-8 (coded on 6 bits each) defining callsign when flight plan is available or the registration marking when no flight plan is available. See ICAO document Annex 10, Volume I, Part I, section 3.8.2.9 for the coding rules.

data.name1: Wildcard Indicators : For each code digit (A, B,  C,  D) ,  a Wildcard (respectively W1,  W2,  W3,  W4) can be set to indicate that the track selection will have to be done whatever is the value of the digit in question. (Wi)

data.name2: Repetition Factor Bits 32/1 Airport Name. Each one of the four Octets composing the name of an airport contains an ASCII Character (upper-case alphabetic) .

subfields.note: the airport names are indicated in the ICAO location indicators book.

data.name2: Repetition Factor Bits 32/1 Airport Name. Each one of the four Octets composing the name of an airport contains an ASCII Character (upper-case alphabetic) .

subfields.note: the airport names are indicated in the ICAO location indicators book. Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages

data.name2: Repetition Factor Bits 32/1 Type of Aircraft. Each one of the four Octets composing the type of an aircraft contains an ASCII Character (upper-case alphabetic with trailing spaces) .

subfields.note: the types of aircraft are defined in ICAO Document 4444.
the centre and the control position identification codes have to be defined between communication partners. Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages

options: tracks from both live and simulated surveillance reports
tracks with altitude using valid Flight Level reports (e.g. Mode C) only
tracks with altitude using assumed height only
tracks correlated to Flight Plan(s) only
tracks not correlated to Flight Plan(s) only
tentative tracks shall not be sent
tracks with SPI flag shall be sent
tracks with SPI flag shall not be sent
IFR selected Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages
Tracks shall be sent irrespectively of Mode 4 value
Tracks shall be sent for friendly targets only
Tracks shall be sent for unknown targets only
Tracks shall be sent for not replying targets only
tracks with ME flag shall be sent
tracks with ME flag shall not be sent
tracks with MI flag shall be sent
tracks with MI flag shall not be sent

I061/210.item definition: The Item Selector is used to define the composition of the track information messages. The bits that compose the Item Selector points the items composing the category 062 UAP.

options: Data Item corresponding to FRN ,i of category 062 UAP not selected Bits 16/10
Data Item corresponding to FRN ,i of category 062 UAP selected Bits 8/2 Bit 25 Bit 17 (FX) field extension Bit 9 Bit 1

subfields.note: The bits in the item selector are arranged in the order defined in Category 062 User Application Profile, described in (Ref.3) . Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages
subfields.subfield info: N1 N2 N3 N4 N5 N6 N7 FX N8 N9 N10 N11 N12 N13 N14 FX

I061/220.item definition: Definition of the Scanning Period, Update Period, Max Data Flow and Extra Delay (to be considered for the track extrapolation) in case of periodical service.

subfields.note: Value 255 means no maximum user input data flow Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages
subfields.subfield info: SD SCANNING PERIOD BATCH PERIOD UPDATE PERIOD 0 EXTRA DELAY MAXFLOW

I061/230.item definition: Transmission Characteristics for a radar synchronised service.

subfields.note: The up-to-date list of SACs is published on the Eurocontrol Web Site (http://www.eurocontrol.int) . Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages

I061/240.item definition: This item contains a number of flags to indicate which events shall be considered for triggering the track information transmission (aperiodical way of transmission) .

subfields.subfield info: Longitudinal Acceleration Threshold – What happens if Cartesian Acceleration?

I061/330.item definition: Report message sent by the Server to the User in relation to a connection or a service.

data.name2: Repetition Factor Bits 16/12 (CODE) – system dependent value

I061/350.item definition: List of Sensor SAC/SIC identifications for which Sensor information are to be provided.

subfields.note: The up-to-date list of SACs is published on the Eurocontrol Web Site (http://www.eurocontrol.int) . Transmission of SDPS Session and Service Control Messages

I061/360.item definition: The Item Selector is used to define the composition of the Sensor information messages. The bits that compose the Item Selector point to the items composing the category 063 UAP.

options: Data Item corresponding to FRN ,i of category 063 UAP not selected Bits 16/10
Data Item corresponding to FRN ,i of category 063 UAP selected Bits 8/2 Bit 17 Bit 9 (FX) field extension Bit 1

subfields.note: The bits in the item selector are arranged in the order defined in Category 063 User Application Profile, described in (Ref.4) .
subfields.subfield info: N1 N2 N3 N4 N5 N6 N7 FX N8 N9 N10 N11 N12 N13 N14 FX
Primary subfield RP DP TSB SRB SGB SAB PRB FX PGB PAB sb FX
